title: Crimson Hills
description: Several people with complicated lives make a journey to Crimson Hills – a mountainous country where monks live. They are eager to meet monks and ask them decisively important questions about their fate, different for each of them. Unfortunately, the Government took the territory of Crimson Hills under its control. They prohibited access of simple people, selling the entrance tickets for the price only the richest can afford. The trespassing without a ticket regards as a revolt and is punished by immediate shooting… Will all of them survive and finish their path? And what answers will they get?
author: Margaret Mal
